title: Bitter Red
lyrics:
Faced with such stern symmetry
Weathered skin turned burgundy
The most handsome man you ever saw
That smirk like sour razor jaw
Hold your rose and

See the fingers are starting to bend



We can move

We can't miss out, no

Before we're gone

You've meant the most

I said it all now



Faced with such soft tendency

Saved a man withdrawn like me

Love you more and I'm on my way home

Forgot everything I'll ever know



Hold your rose in

Bitter red buried it like a fact



We can move

We can't miss out, no

Before we're gone

You've meant the most

I said it all now



As pure as they come

And I was after the same light you drew

It's been too much

And I could never say aloud

"That's enough"



Mercy now, mercy now, blood
